title: Pet Friendly House Available for Rent (3 Bed, 2 Bath)
posting_body: ['3 bed, 2 bath pet friendly townhouse with finished basement available for rent in Evanston.', 'The property features', '- A covered garage, keyless entry, smart plugs and central air that can be controlled via app.', '- The kitchen is equipped with a brand new refrigerator and garbage disposal; gas stove, dishwasher, and microwave in great condition.', '- In-unit washer and dryer in basement laundry room.', '- Comfortable and cozy living room with large windows that capture morning sunlight.', '- Tons of storage space in hallways and rooms.', '- Family and pet friendly.', '- Walking distance to ETHS, Dewey Elementary School as well as Mason and Penny Parks.', 'Conveniently located a few blocks away from Valli Produce and accessible to public transportation.', '- Next to a bike path to ride to downtown and Northwestern University (1.7 miles away)', 'More Features:', '- No breed or weight restrictions on pets (2 pets max).', "- No security deposit, however, non-refundable $750 move-in and $750 move-out fees will apply along with the first month's rent.", 'Utilities included in rent:', '- High speed internet', '- Water, Trash', '- Security system with Video doorbell.', 'More Information and to apply: <URL>']
